metadata.Title: CVE-2023-22911 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.9, 1.36.x through 1.38.x before 1.38.5, and 1.39.x before 1.39.1. E-Widgets does widget replacement in HTML attributes, which can lead to XSS, because widget authors often do not expect that their widget is executed in an HTML attribute context.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
